chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
naetli: no_append_entries_to_leader_interface
naetsi: no_append_entries_to_self_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
laei: log_all_entries_interface
aelli: append_entries_leaderLogs_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
mili: match_index_leader_interface
matchisi: match_index_sanity_interface
aersi: append_entries_reply_sublog_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> type st' = Leader -> type st = Leader

Premises:
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
logIndex = nat : Set
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
term = nat : Set
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (Ra

handleAppendEntries_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntries_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntries_type_term : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))
no_append_entries_to_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> type (nwState net (pDst p)) = Leader -> currentTerm (nwState net (pDst p)) = t -> False : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments no_append_entries_to_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
no_append_entries_to_self = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> pDst p = pSrc p -> False : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments no_append_entries_to_self {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleAppendEntriesReply_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (n : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st n t es r = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_type : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t c li lt = (st', m) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_type_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleAppendEntriesReply_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
append_entries_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> Prop Arguments append_entries_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleClientRequest_candidate : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (os, st', m) -> type st' = Candidate -> st' = st
doLeader_candidate : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> type st' = Candidate -> st' = st
doGenericServer_log_type_term_votesReceived : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votesReceived st' = votesReceived st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleRequestVoteReply_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r = st' -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' > currentTerm st \/ type st = Candidate /\ type st' = Leader /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
handleRequestVoteReply_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (h' : name) (r : bool) (st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), type st' = Candidate -> handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r = st' -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st
handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
handleRequestVoteReply_matchIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), type (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = matchIndex st \/ assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v)) n 0 = maxIndex (log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v))
handleRequestVoteReply_spec' : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> (type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true) /\ r = true /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ currentTerm st = t /\ votesReceived st' = h' :: votesReceived st)
leader_sublog_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_append_entries_reply_sublog : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (es : list entry) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> In e es -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h)))
append_entries_reply_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (es : list entry) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es true -> currentTerm (nwState net h) = t -> type (nwState net h) = Leader -> In e es -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments append_entries_reply_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleClientRequest_matchIndex_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader /\ matchIndex st' = assoc_set name_eq_dec (matchIndex st) h (S (maxIndex (log st)))))
handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
update_elections_data_timeout_votedFor : forall (h cid : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd st) = (out, st', m) -> votedFor st' = Some cid -> votedFor (snd st) = Some cid /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm (snd st) /\ type st' = type (snd st) /\ votesWithLog (update_elections_data_timeout h st) = votesWithLog (fst st) \/ cid = h /\ currentTerm st' = S (currentTerm (snd st)) /\ votesWithLog (update_elections_data_timeout h st) = (currentTerm st', cid, log st') :: votesWithLog (fst st)
terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> terms_and_indices_from_one entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_update_elections_data_RVR : forall (h src : name) (t1 : nat) (v : bool) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t2 : term) (ll : list entry) (st' : raft_data), handleRequestVoteReply h (snd st) src t1 v = st' -> In (t2, ll) (leaderLogs (update_elections_data_requestVoteReply h src t1 v st)) -> In (t2, ll) (leaderLogs (fst st)) \/ type st' = Leader /\ type (snd st) = Candidate /\ t2 = currentTerm st' /\ ll = log st'

```coq
intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' m H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
apply handleAppendEntries_type in H1.
destruct H1 as [H3 [H4 | H5]].
- apply H3.
- destruct H5 as [H6 | H7].
  + apply H6.
  + apply handleAppendEntries_log_term_type in H1.
    destruct H1 as [_ [_ [_ H8]]].
    apply H8.
Qed.```
